DocumentCreateElement.summary: In an HTML document, the document.createElement() method creates the HTML element specified by tagName, or an if tagName isn't recognized.

DocumentCreateElement.returns:
The new .
NOTENote: A new {{domxref("HTMLElement", "HTMLElement", "", "1")}} is returned if the document is an {{domxref("HTMLDocument", "HTMLDocument", , "1")}}, which is the most common case. Otherwise a new {{domxref("Element","Element",,"1")}} is returned.
